content.text: I'll help you get started with this WordPress site. Let me first explore the project structure to understand what we're working with.

todos.content: Explore project structure and understand the WordPress setup
Review custom post types and plugins
Examine recent changes and current state

<?php
define( 'WP_CACHE', true ); 
/**
 * The base configurations of the WordPress.
 *
 * This file has the following configurations: MySQL settings, Table Prefix,
 * Secret Keys, WordPress Language, and ABSPATH. You can find more information
 * by visiting {@link http://codex.wordpress.org/Editing_wp-config.php Editing
 * wp-config.php} Codex page. You can get the MySQL settings from your web host.
 *
 * This file is used by the wp-config.php creation script during the
 * installation. You don't have to use the web site, you can just copy this file
 * to "wp-config.php" and fill in the values.
 *
 * @package WordPress
 */
// ** MySQL settings - You can get this info from your web host ** //
/** The name of the database for WordPress */
define('DB_NAME', 'zqapmrpnsu');
/** MySQL database username */
define('DB_USER', 'zqapmrpnsu');
/** MySQL database password */
define('DB_PASSWORD', 'MbJFe5HdNP');
/** MySQL hostname */
define('DB_HOST', 'localhost');
/** Database Charset to use in creating database tables. */
define('DB_CHARSET', 'utf8');
/** The Database Collate type. Don't change this if in doubt. */
define('DB_COLLATE', '');
/**#@+
 * Authentication Unique Keys and Salts.
 * Change these to different unique phrases!
 * You can generate these using the {@link https://api.wordpress.org/secret-key/1.1/salt/ WordPress.org secret-key service}
 */
require('wp-salt.php');
/**
 * WordPress Database Table prefix.
 *
 * You can have multiple installations in one database if you give each a unique
 * prefix. Only numbers, letters, and underscores please!
 */
$table_prefix  = 'wp_';
/**
 * WordPress Localized Language, defaults to English.
 *
 * Change this to localize WordPress. A corresponding MO file for the chosen
 * language must be installed to wp-content/languages. For example, install
 * de_DE.mo to wp-content/languages and set WPLANG to 'de_DE' to enable German
 * language support.
 */
define('FS_METHOD','direct');
define('WPLANG', '');
define('FS_CHMOD_DIR', (0775 & ~ umask()));
define('FS_CHMOD_FILE', (0664 & ~ umask()));
/**
 * For developers: WordPress debugging mode.
 *
 * Change this to true to enable the display of notices during development.
 * It is strongly recommended that plugin and theme developers use WP_DEBUG
 * in their development environments.
 */
define('WP_DEBUG', FALSE);
define( 'WP_REDIS_CONFIG', [
   'token' => "e279430effe043b8c17d3f3c751c4c0846bc70c97f0eaaea766b4079001c",
   'host' => '127.0.0.1',
   'port' => 6379,
   'database' => "7684", 
   'timeout' => 2.5,
   'read_timeout' => 2.5,
   'split_alloptions' => true,
   'async_flush' => true,
   'client' => 'phpredis', 
   'compression' => 'zstd', 
   'serializer' => 'igbinary', 
   'prefetch' => true, 
   'debug' => false,
   'save_commands' => false,
   'prefix' => DB_NAME,  
   ] );
define( 'WP_REDIS_DISABLED', false );
/* That's all, stop editing! Happy blogging. */
/** Absolute path to the WordPress directory. */
if ( !defined('ABSPATH') )
        define('ABSPATH', dirname(__FILE__) . '/');
/** Sets up WordPress vars and included files. */
require_once(ABSPATH . 'wp-settings.php');
define('DOMAIN_CURRENT_SITE', 'villastuart.nwdesigns.it');

<?php
	/**
	 * Theme functions and definitions - VERSIONE MODULARE
	 *
	 * @package HelloElementorChild
	 */
	
	if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
		exit;
	}
	
	define( 'HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_VERSION', '2.0.0' );
	define( 'HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_PATH', get_stylesheet_directory() );
	define( 'HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC', HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_PATH . '/inc' );
	
	// Core functionality
	require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/core/cache-helpers.php';
	require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/core/wpml-helpers.php';
	require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/core/theme-setup.php';
	
	// Features
	require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/features/acf-featured-content.php';
	require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/features/staff-management.php';
	require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/features/noindex-management.php';
	require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/features/service-categories.php';
	require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/features/related-terms.php';
	
	// Shortcodes
	require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/shortcodes/staff-shortcodes.php';
	require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/shortcodes/related-terms-shortcode.php';
	require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/shortcodes/related-external-links-shortcode.php';
	
	// Admin
	require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/admin/admin-notices-control.php';
	require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/admin/doctor-custom-order-panel.php';
	require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/admin/service-custom-order-panel.php';
	require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/admin/admin-columns.php';
	require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/admin/doctor-archive-query.php';
	require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/admin/service-archive-query.php';
  require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/admin/service-keywords-updater.php';
	
	// CLI commands (solo se WP-CLI è disponibile)
	if ( defined( 'WP_CLI' ) && WP_CLI ) {
		require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/cli/cache-commands.php';
	}

content.text:
This is a WordPress site for Villa Stuart clinic using a custom child theme of Hello Elementor. The setup includes:

**Theme**: "Hello Elementor Villa Stuart - Modular" (v2.0.0) - A child theme with modular architecture

**Key Features**:
- Advanced caching system using WordPress transients
- Staff/Doctor management with custom post types
- Service categories with search keywords
- WPML multilingual support
- ACF (Advanced Custom Fields) integration
- Custom admin interfaces and WP-CLI commands

**Custom Post Types**:
- `doctor` - Medical staff with roles, specializations
- `service` - Medical services with staff relationships
- `partner_assicurazioni` - Insurance partners

**Notable Technical Details**:
- WordPress 6.7.1
- Redis object cache enabled
- Breeze cache plugin configured
- Development domain: villastuart.nwdesigns.it

The theme has excellent documentation in CLAUDE.md with development commands, architecture details, and testing guidelines using Playwright MCP server.
